I am listing on ebay 3 1880's Victorian Baseball Scorecards for 7 day auctions.  All are very beautiful and unique.

Picture is an example of one of the 3 lots.

They are schedule to start tonight after 6:00 PM PST

Please go to my items - my username is jonanddavid
